title: LP LOST AFTER REMAKE ????? PICTURE ATTACHED

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: -3 lp after remake, soloing by myself

replies.body:
It's because you were sitting at 0 LP, then dodged a champ select, and THEN got into that remade game. As you can see, you earned 0 LP for that game. But because you dodged before that game, you lost 3 LP (hence -3 LP). You only get negative LP through dodges, not by losing.

Hope this helps :D
